ComicInfo.Summary:
The Duke of Wellington is trapped in a pit with a shapeshifting monster, and heâ€™s not just fighting for his own life, but the lives of everyone who will die if the beast gets free. And no matter who wins, nothing will ever be the same for the Iron Duke again. Brace yourselves for the shocking conclusion of this amazing monster-hunting adventure from Aaron Mahnke, the creator of the award-winning LORE podcast and New York Times Bestselling author Delilah Dawson (STAR WARS: PHASMA, STARPIG, TALES OF PELL)!
